mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T4.HTBH JHBH, T3.LJMC, T2.GYDLMC, T1.GYXLMC, T.YWCL, T.SJWCL, T1.SL, T1.SYSL - T1.JHSCSL SYSL, T.PX FROM T_SCGL_BGRWFP_BG_RW T, T_SCGL_LJGYBZ T1, T_SCGL_GYDLBZ T2, T_SCJHGL_LJGL T3, T_SCJHGL_HTGL T4 WHERE 1=1 AND T.LJGYBZID = T1.ID AND T1.GYDLBZID = T2.ID AND T2.LJID = T3.ID AND T3.HTID = T4.ID AND T.FPSBID = #{entity.fpsbid} ORDER BY T.PX
